subproject.description: Support national actions to mitigate greenhouse gases (GHGs) and address climate change while meeting the national development objectives. It will strengthen the information base and institutional capacities, leverage international and local financial resources and develop strategic partnerships for implementation of the National Climate Change Action Plan. Particular focus is on (a) energy efficiency, (b) access to clean energy, (c) access to environmental finance, and (d) knowledge management.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Addressing Climate Change
